title: Olly’s sham-pagne
description: Cutting back on calories? You don't have to give up the bubbly at a social occasion with this elderflower mocktail.

show.b073qz82: Good Food Friday with Michel Roux Jr and Olly Smith

steps: Pour all the ingredients into a jug and give it a stir. Serve in champagne flutes to blend in at a party.
